Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), freeglut3-dev, gettext, itstool, libasound2-dev [linux-any], libfftw3-dev, libjack-dev, portaudio19-dev, qt6-base-dev, qt6-l10n-tools, qt6-multimedia-dev, qt6-svg-dev, qt6-tools-dev-tools
Description: Free Music Instrument Tuner FMIT is a graphical utility for tuning your musical instruments, with error and volume history and advanced features like microtonal tuning, statistics, and various views like waveform shape, harmonics ratios and real-time Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT). All views and advanced features are optional so that the interface can also be very simple.
